channel.title: CVE Feed for bestwebsoft -- Profile Extra Fields by BestWebSoft
channel.description: The latest CVEs for bestwebsoft -- Profile Extra Fields by BestWebSoft

item.title: CVE-2023-4469|2024-08-02T07:31:06.109Z -- bestwebsoft -- profile%20extra%20fields%20by%20bestwebsoft
item.description: The Profile Extra Fields by BestWebSoft plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized access of data due to a missing capability check on the prflxtrflds_export_file function in versions up to, and including, 1.2.7. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to expose potentially sensitive user data, including data entered into custom fields.
